name: Finding Home (MonkeeDan)
description:
Waking up all alone at the foot of the tree he calls his home, the young and frail Schlaf makes it his mission to get back home and inquire what led to his unwanted adventure.

                                                              

Story:

Schlaf always felt like he‘s disliked by his family. May it be because he‘s lazy, always sleeping, unable to fly or due to his different appearance. This feeling solidifies when he wakes up one morning finding himself at the root of his home - the tree he‘s spent all his life in. After making up his mind, he decides  to accept the challenge and climb back up to his family‘s nest and confront them. The only question left is; how will he be able to get back up, without the ability to fly and being oblivious to the dangers ahead of him?

                                                                                      

Controls:
